message: I propose a 90/10 split in my favor. Let's start with a fair offer, but be aware that the money will be worth less with each round.
I propose a 55/45 split in my favor.  This is a fairer split that takes into account the inflation we are both facing.  Let's get this settled before the money loses too much value.
I'm willing to compromise.  A 60/40 split is fair given the inflation and the fact that I'll be making the next offer if you reject this one.
